entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Flurries at times heavy ending early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 80 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
